title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Jhumka - Pancharatna Kundan Jhummakulu
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features emerald cabochons (approximately 2 carats total weight) and high-quality cubic zirconia stones with VVS clarity. Genuine seed pearl accents at the bottom of the jhumka.
features: These elegant Jhumkas feature a floral motif at the ear lobe adorned with a central emerald. The cascading design leads to a classic bell-shaped Jhumka, intricately latticed with diamond-like CZ stones. Features a hanging seed pearl for a touch of traditional charm. The openwork design lends a modern, lightweight feel to a traditional form.
colors: and shimmering white (CZ stones). The traditional color combination is highly auspicious.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to showcase your traditional elegance. Also suitable for formal events and festive gatherings.
description: These Jhumkas beautifully blend tradition and modern aesthetics. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, while the high-quality CZ stones provide exceptional brilliance at an accessible price point. The emerald accents add a touch of regality and auspiciousness. A timeless design that will be treasured for generations. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear.
